events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred yesterday afternoon involving significant front-end damage.
Claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to references to vehicle collision and damage.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim for further processing and support.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim details.
Request sent for police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates to proceed with investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documentation including the accident police report and repair quotes.
Initial investigation launched by claims team to verify details and assess damage related to the auto accident.
Investigation confirmed validity of claim and eligibility for coverage under policy terms.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on repair costs and policy limits.
Customer acknowledged and accepted the proposed settlement, expressing gratitude for prompt service.
Claim approval finalized following customer acceptance of the settlement offer.
Payment was processed and issued to customer to cover vehicle repair expenses as agreed.
The auto accident claim case was officially closed after payment confirmation and customer satisfaction.
All claim documentation and records were archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
